paragraphs.body: I'm going to be inactive for the next week until Friday 29 May due to my school's outdoor education camp. A week of camping, hiking, rock-climbing and abseiling. In the Australian winter. Should be fun.
paragraphs.text: I'm going to be inactive for the next week until Friday 29 May due to my school's outdoor education camp. A week of camping, hiking, rock-climbing and abseiling. In the Australian winter. Should be fun.

paragraphs.body: While I'm absent, don't get too excited about me having to be there to post my opinions on a discussion. Just do whatever needs to be done. Of course, I will be touched if you wait for me though :). However, with my proposal about the page splits, I'd prefer that no-one try to touch or implement that (if it even succeeds) until I return. Anyway, votes are supposed to run for two weeks... Don't get too worried about BSST. The newsletter will, as usual, be released fortnightly, this time on 30 May.

paragraphs.body: As any of you may have noticed, by activity here has been scarce this week. Due to real life problems and my own criteria of checking edits, my activity here is likely to become less frequent. Mostly due to college, I can no longer fine comb each and every edit (excluding fanon content), like I used to. Article comments in their sheer numbers is also something that makes me cringe a little, but I can't purge those from the recent changes without also purging edits to actual talk pages. In the event my edits here dwindle even more, I hereby ask all sysops to keep up the good work, go through all edits, the usual stuff. I don't mean to sound condescending, but you guys could be a bit more more rigid with blocks and warnings. Going as far back as I could (about 5000 edits), I found vandalism that was simply reverted, yet no warning was given. I can no longer say I enjoy being part of this wiki as much I used to. I will continue to try coming here and edit as I do, but expect me to show up less. Omnibender - Talk - Contributions 22:10, August 22, 2010 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I will be pretty inactive as of tomorrow, as in Week 7 of this term, I have my Preliminary Higher School Certificate exams, and I need to study, study, study! So unfortunately, my planned work on the fanon portal will be delayed, as will general helping out. I will definitely try to keep in touch with people, so you all know I'm alive. :P And I will still be able to manage the User Awards. I would have been much more active in these seven weeks, but I have been selected as a member of the Wikia Community Council, and so what Wikia time I might have had will be taken up by that. Don't miss me too much! Rassilon of Old (Talk - Teru - ${link_0}) 23:38, July 15, 2011 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Some things have come up in my personal life and I need to take some time away from the wiki to make it right. paragraphs.body: I am currently involved in my school's production of Beauty and the Beast, and with the responsiblity of having a principal role, it's starting to take a toll on my life. That being said, I just need to stay away from the wiki for a while. I will return on February 20 when the show is over. I will attempt to adhere to my review schedule, though I can make no guarantees. Millennia2 02:58, January 17, 2012 (UTC)
